None.Name: Deathwish
None.Description: Unit permanently deals 25% more damage but also loses 30 life points every 2 seconds. Reusable every 10 seconds.

None.Name: Sacrifice
None.Description: Activate to sacrifice an own unit in order to transfer the victim's lifepoints into own lifepoints. Reusable every 15 seconds.
